name: T20. Dynamic Button Behavior Based On Model Data
description: Tabular display of array-based data using vux-data-table-property. The objective of this test is to show how the delete button behaves dynamically based on the provided boolean values.

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.label_tooltip: Controls whether the delete button is disabled.
disabled.info_text: When true, the delete button is disabled for this row.

hidden.label: Hidden
hidden.label_tooltip: Controls whether the delete button is hidden.
hidden.info_text: When true, the delete button is hidden for this row.

waiting.label: Waiting
waiting.label_tooltip: Indicates a waiting state for delete button.
waiting.info_text: When true, the delete button shows a waiting/loading state.

delete.tooltip: Delete this row from the array.

new.label: Create
new.tooltip: Add a new row to the array.
